#include <iostream>
#include <stdlib.h>

using namespace std;

int lis( int arr[], int n )
{
   int *lis, i, j, max = 0;
   lis = (int*) malloc ( sizeof( int ) * n );
 
   for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
      lis[i] = 1;
    
   for (i = 1; i < n; i++)
      for ( j = 0; j < i; j++ )
         if ( arr[i] > arr[j] && lis[i] < lis[j] + 1)
            lis[i] = lis[j] + 1;
    
   for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
      if (max < lis[i])
         max = lis[i];
 
   free(lis);
 
   return max;
}
 
int main()
{
  int arr[20];
  int i, n, t;

  cin >> t;

  while(t--)
  {
    cin >> n;
    for(i = 0; i < n; i++)
      cin >> arr[i];
    
    cout << lis(arr, n) << '\n';
  }
  return 0;
}
